sub_title: Director & Editor in Chief Dutch IT Channel & Dutch IT Leaders| Platform for Tech Business Industry and IT Decision Makers
summary:
Witold Kepinski (1969) is A Tech Business Content Professional, Editor in Chief and Owner / Founder of Dutch IT-channel (www.dutchitchannel.nl). 

Witold is also owner of the Dutch IT-channel Awards (www.dutchitawards.nl) and Dutch IT Events about cloud, security, digital workplace and the Future of Business Technology. 

Witold provides content marketing, lead generation, articles, blogs, videos, events and consultancy for IT / tech companies, communities and people.

Witold helps tech companies to connect with business partners/IT-resellers/system integrators/solution providers/service providers/hosters/VAR and decision makers/DMU/LOB/CIO/IT-management/IT-Pro.

EXPERTISE 

Managing - Publishing - Events - Editorial Productions - Connecting People - Content Marketing - Sales - Performance Improvement - Managing teams for Tech and Business platforms - Support go-to-market strategy - PR & Communications

PERSONAL

Tech Business Expert - Content Producer - Business Focused - International & Local - Entrepreneurial - Networker - Solution Focused - Creative -  Purposeful - Diplomatic 

KNOWLEDGE

Leadership, vision, Cloud, Big Data, Mobile, Digital Transformation, Business Transformation, Social Media, Software, Apps, Managed Services, Research companies, Networking, Infrastructure, OS, Open Source, Server, Peripherals, Printing, Retail & CE, Security, Storage, Data, System Builders, Telecom, Virtualization, Networking, Automotive, Datacenter, Internet of Things (IoT), Containers, Unified Communications (uc), IT-distribution, Resellers, IT Business, Consumer Tech, Analytics
